select
from yonghuzhuce where yonghuming = #{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from yonghuzhuce where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and chushengnianyue >= concat('',#{chushengnianyue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and chushengnianyue <= concat('',#{chushengnianyue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and QQ like concat('%',#{QQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and youxiang like concat('%',#{youxiang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenfenzheng like concat('%',#{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and touxiang like concat('%',#{touxiang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and dizhi like concat('%',#{dizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from yonghuzhuce where 1=1
and yonghuming =#{yonghuming}

select from yonghuzhuce where 1=1 and yonghuming like concat('%',#{yonghuming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and chushengnianyue >= concat('',#{chushengnianyue1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and chushengnianyue <= concat('',#{chushengnianyue2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and QQ like concat('%',#{QQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and youxiang like concat('%',#{youxiang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenfenzheng like concat('%',#{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and touxiang like concat('%',#{touxiang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and dizhi like concat('%',#{dizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

yonghuming, mima, xingming, xingbie, chushengnianyue, QQ, youxiang, shouji, shenfenzheng, touxiang, dizhi, beizhu,
addtime,

update yonghuzhuce
